articleUiBy.text.value: Creating an interface for Belarus is a bilingual challenge. The product should be understandable for both Russian-speaking and Belarusian-speaking users. We examine how to organize the translation structure, what UX solutions exist for language switching, and why it's important to pay attention to the authenticity of Belarusian content.

articleUiBy.title.value: Bilingual interface: how to accommodate Russian and Belarusian languages in one product
